title: WERE IS OUR LEAGUE LORE?!?!?
body:
You promised us the hole runeterra map Riot,
Were is it? Its been far to long since the noxus map...
ITS TIME FOR MORE!

replies.body:
They said they wanted to make a map but Riot has set big goals for themselves. They never said when it would be released.

There is lore coming out. Urgot's bio and short story for example. Kayn's bio and short story. They both give more insight into some countries. Lore events like Demacia don't get to happen every month because they take a lot of work.

ITS BEEN ALMOST 8 MONTHS SINCE THE NOXIAN MAP GOT RELEASED...
We need the rest of runeterra...

> [{quoted}](name=hiukas,realm=EUNE,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=schfxTZQ,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2017-07-31T19:11:34.505+0000)
>
> ITS BEEN ALMOST 8 MONTHS SINCE THE NOXIAN MAP GOT RELEASED...
> We need the rest of runeterra...

Whoah there, no need to shout.

{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}} 

We're working on it, but like I said in the [Ask Riot](http://nexus.leagueoflegends.com/2017/06/ask-riot-autofilled/) post, it's going to take a bit of time before we get that next map out.

I really am trying my best to get the next map to you guys - and as Arakadia says, there's some stories coming out in the meantime.  Alas, despite my best wishes, we don't yet seem to be releasing cartographic content for every champ update or release :(  If only.

(I voted yes (ME!) for more maps and lore, btw.  Because oh hell yes I want more maps and lore to come out too!)
When we'll get a map we should expect just cool-looking map with lots of geographical names or there will be short descriptions for most of the places?

Do you have in your minds eye an idea of where some of the runeterra champs would be closest to? And as a sort of connected thing do you eventually want to give every champion a nation, I really wish ziliean was part of piltover again for instance.

>I voted yes (ME!) for more maps and lore, btw.

So, we now know for sure you're not an {{champion:81}}  main then.
-------------------
p.s. I liked the Shurima artifact the best so far,
'cause it had strong cultural ties in the layout :3

I think that stuff is fun.

They only recently confirmed that we'll get a world map.
Before that the plan was to give us smaller maps with other updates.
It prob taking awhile to make
I know but its been a RLY long time since the last map update...
